name: TechEnabler Header Links Removal
author: TechEnabler

sections.description: Hackers frequently base on known vulnerabilities to attack websites. This Header Links Removal plugin secures your website by removing the version of core WordPress functions as well as unneccessary tags from displaying in the HTML source, thus making it harder for hackers to exploit on vulnerabilities when your WordPress and plugins are not updated to the latest versions.
sections.installation:
Install from your WordPress “Plugins > Add New” and search for “TechEnabler Header Links Removal” plugin.

Follow these steps for manual installation:

  1. Upload the zip file and unzip it in the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory.
  2. Activate the plugin “TechEnabler Header Links Removal” in the “Plugins” page.

short_description: Remove these  tags from the header : rsd, wlwmanifest, wp_shortlink, feed_links, feed_links_extra, rest_output_link, discovery_links, rest_output, wp_ …
